Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 2.9 nm and 3.4 nm (cages), 1.2 nm and 1.4 nm (windows)

Other Information.Test Conditions: Mixed solvent of ethanol/HFE-7100 and ethanol/Glycine-HCl
Other Information.Additional Info: Pyrazine-functionalized MIL-101(Cr) shows higher effective density in polar mixtures.
Pyridine-functionalized MIL-101(Cr) shows a lower effective density due to increased ethanol content.
Density measurements show preferential uptake of solvent components.

Sieving Mechanism: Selective enhancement of solvent components in pores

Experimental Validation.Method: Nanomechanical mass correlation spectroscopy using suspended microchannel resonator
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Effective density varies depending on solvent composition and functionalization.

Other Information.Additional Info: Functionalization with pyrazine or pyridine alters the affinity for specific solvent components.
